nodes.documentation: @title Transfer Manager for limiting maximum number of token holders
nodes.name: CountTransferManager

nodes.documentation:
@notice Used to verify the transfer transaction and prevent a transfer if it passes the allowed amount of token holders
@param _to Address of the receiver
nodes.name: verifyTransfer

nodes.documentation:
@notice Used to initialize the variables of the contract
@param _maxHolderCount Maximum no. of holders this module allows the SecurityToken to have
nodes.name: configure

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sets the cap for the amount of token holders there can be
@param _maxHolderCount is the new maximum amount of token holders
nodes.name: changeHolderCount

nodes.documentation: @notice This function returns the signature of configure function
nodes.name: getInitFunction

nodes.documentation: @notice Returns the permissions flag that are associated with CountTransferManager
nodes.name: getPermissions
